item.title: How to Make Your Child Talk
item.dc:creator: letstalknila
item.content:encoded:
Hello Friends!! I see many Parents worried about their 2 year old not speaking. Parents please don’t panic. Every kid is different. Each kids pick up at their own phase. Believe me once they start talking they never gonna stop!!

One Main thing as Parents we could do is talk to them a lot at their early stage like when they are months old! We should talk to them as we talk to a 4 year old. If we talk one or two words they cannot understand the structure of our language. So talk to them as if they can understand everything. Their mind keeps registering everything and once they start speaking they will use all those vocabulary!!

This is my Personal experience!!

Also start with a single language, the language the house speaks the most. Babies get confused if we talk more than one language. Once they start talking you can teach up to 3 languages.

One more thing you can do to help them Talk is read book with them. Tell them Stories,sing songs with them. Ask them simple questions. Initially they might not answer, but gradually they will start responding to you!Good Luck Parents!!

#letstalknila #tamilparenting #parenting

https://youtu.be/av58qxG9KXY

item.title: How to Understand your wife??
item.dc:creator: letstalknila
item.content:encoded:
Men always complain that it is very difficult to understand wife. Actually it's very easy to understand your wife!! Just feel her as Your Best Half. You will start understanding Her!!

Spend Time with Her

Women never expect Jewels or Money from a Husband. She only expects His time and care. If a Man could spend at least half an hour of his day talking to her she will be more than happy. A Women brain is designed as such she should speak at least 20000 words per day. Surprising right!! So even if you wonder what to talk to your wife, just hear her out. She will feel more relaxed and content.

Appreciate Her

Try to appreciate your wife whenever she does something new. Every Human being lived to be appreciated. Compliment her for the things she does for You. When you appreciate her She will try to do it more better for you next time. Husband and wife complementing each other makes the relationship more stronger !!

Acknowledge Her Dreams

Your wife is also a similar person who has grown up with lot of Dreams like you. Please be a Shoulder to her in fulfilling her dreams. Respect her Personal time. When your wife has something interesting to do other than her family duties she will even stop nagging you. Remember Marriage shouldn't stop her from achieving her dreams!!

Give Her a Helping Hand

Please remember a wife also gets tired after a long day like you. She is not a Super Human being who can never get tired. She also feels lazy and tired sometimes. Help her in taking care of your kids. You could also cook and surprise her in weekends!!

Never Let down Her for sake of others

Your wife is the person who is going to build your Next generation of family. Please respect her importance in your life. She plays the major role in your life sharing your responsibilities in life.Never let down her for any reason.

A supportive husband always give wife great confidence in her life. A wife who is confident and happy only can Parent her kids well. Make your wife the Priority and You can see how your wife celebrates You!!!

My Next post is About Understanding your Husband!!

wp:comment.wp:comment_author: Understanding The Man in Your Life – Let’s Talk Nila

item.title: Understanding The Man in Your Life
item.dc:creator: letstalknila
item.content:encoded:
Hi Ladies the post is especially for you. How to understand the priceless Man in our life!!

Respect their Alone Time

Men always love to be left alone for sometime. They like to sit alone and think of nothing. Strange right! Women on contrary always like to be in a company and they cannot stop thinking of something. But please understand the Man in your life when he asks to be left alone. Please don't keep asking questions to him that time. Do not worry that he is worried. He will be alright in sometime. He just needs his personal space to refresh his mind.

Ask Help to Receive Help

Wives always complain that their Husbands never help them in their household chores or in parenting the children. Actually Men are always ready to help you, the thing is they can't realize that you need their help. Most of the men can only concentrate on one thing at a time. If they are watching tv they only watch tv, they can't hear the whistle sound in kitchen, so they can't understand their wife need a helping hand in kitchen. So wives next time when u need a help ask him in words so that your husband can understand. Never keep waiting that your husband will understand and help by himself. If you ask help you get help!!

Appreciate your Husband

Every person in this world loves to be appreciated. So wives take a moment in your busy schedule to thank your husband. He plays a major role in your life taking care of your family. He puts all the duties of the family on his shoulders. Remember how your father has toiled his whole life for the family. Your husband is such a man in your family. Take time to pat his shoulder so that he will feel acknowledged for his hard work!!

Acknowledge His Friendship

Men always loves to be in the company of his friends for a while. Give him a break occasionally from the family so that he could get away with his friends. This time helps him to refresh himself. Believe me when he comes back he will love you more!! Please don't stop him from continuing his friendship after marriage. Everybody both men and women needs friends other than our family. If u always nag him to be with you he will feel really irritated. Just allow him to hang with his friends now and then so that he will feel relaxed. Doesn't he need a break after so much hardwork?!!

Show Love to receive Love

Don't always expect that your husband should be the first person between both of u to express his love. Love is never a one way traffic!! Express your love to ur Husband whenever you feel it. Just like women, men also likes to be loved and cared. Take a break in ur day to day work, pause and say a I LOVE U to ur husband. He loves to hear it Just like You.! Try to cook his favorite recipes and Dress urself pleasing to him. I do understand wives have so much work like cooking, taking care of kids and office. But your husband is also a person who is waiting for your love. Many wives forget their husband after having children. They spend their whole life taking care of their kids. But remember it's the husband who is going to be with you the rest of your life. It's very important to take care of kids but at the same time do not forget your poor husband. Start loving him more and you can see the magic, he will also start sharing your work!!

Do not forget to read my other blog on "How to Understand your wife"

How to understand your wife

item.title: Stress in Weight Loss Journey
item.dc:creator: letstalknila
item.content:encoded:
Hi Friend!! Are You a Person who is in the middle of a weight loss journey but feel very stressed out !?? Now Read along to get a pinch of motivation in You. Following are some of the tips to follow to Motivate yourself for weight loss. 👍

1. Be Practical in Weight loss

Be practical , No one can reduce weight in next 10 days. It requires lot of consistency and hard-work. Any magic drink cannot fetch you results , in fact there is no magic drink which can blast all your pounds in a single day. So be practical over your weight loss journey.

2. Start with small steps

You decided to lose weight and the first thing which pops in your mind is Join a Gym, but stop it doesn't work that way. Start your weight loss journey with small steps like using stairs rather than elevator, walk to work place or park your car somewhere far in parking lot and walk your way. Walk some extra steps and this will be a motivation for you to take bigger step. Start walking in home , in parks , in your neighborhood, this habit will slowly land you in a Gym. If u straight way start with a Gym you cannot be consistent. You might hit the gym for first 1 week but slowly your motivation slows down and you will forget where is your Gym Bag 😂 3. Stop snacking Unhealthy Whenever you feel hungry do you search the pantry for a bag of chips or a packet of cookies then you have to stop it immediately. The unhealthy snacks are the main reason for weight gain , if u stop eating unhealthy and alter it with healthy snacks like a Fruit or carrot or yogurt then you can see a visible difference in your weight. 4. Are you eating on right time Are you a person who skips breakfast and eat your dinner very late then weight loss is very impossible for you. Eating on right time is as important as eating healthy. Metabolism of your body improves when you eat food on right time and this in turn will result in weight loss. Also eating dinner early will work wonders for weight loss. 5. Engage Yourself in a Hobby You might wonder how hobby and weight loss is related ?!! Are you a person who eat constantly and want to break this habit then remember this point. When you engage yourself in a hobby your mind is not bored then keeps you away from snacking unhealthy. Many of us snack constantly just because we feel bored or want some thing to engage us when we watch our favorite Netflix series. Instead if you drown yourself into some hobby you will never feel bored to snack again !! Visit my YouTube channel for more of such videos https://youtu.be/tIFvWYKDeD8

item.title: What to do on a H4 Visa - Fill the Career Gap
item.dc:creator: letstalknila
item.content:encoded:
Hi Friends !! If you are one among me who live on a H4 Dependent Visa can definitely understand how depressing it is to be idle at home. Even though you may be talented well enough your visa status doesn't allow you to work!! https://youtu.be/PaQxc1IBjf8 So here I am with some useful ideas to engage yourself and in turn fill your career gap too. Career gap is one big curse every H4 visa holder face in their life. You can follow some of my ideas and impress your recruiter when they ask what you did in your wait time. Listed below are some of the tips you can follow.

1. Volunteering

Many H4 holders assume they cannot work anywhere , but the truth is you can work but you should not earn any income from it. So why not volunteer in the places where they might need your skill. You can volunteer in libraries, workshops in organizations and local groups. This experience will definitely give a good exposure and guess what it might be listed in your Profile too. Yes, Volunteering serves the Comment as well as give a good impression in your profile too 👍

2. Blog your Ideas

Blogging will help you bring out the innovative content in your mind as well as keep you engaged. If you are very good at written skills then definitely consider blogging. Blog content which you are good at, like cooking, home organization, parenting , gardening, technology , fitness etc. You can blog even on social content and gain your audience. Guess what, when you have a good crowd following , You can even monetize your blog later in your life. Once you have work permit you can monetize your content and earn money from it. Wordpress is one platform I use for blogging and very easy to use too. Try your luck and it can become your career too 👍

3. Start a YouTube Career

Starting a YouTube channel is one of the recent trends in social media. If You are good people person and have great communication skill you can consider opening a YouTube channel. To start a YouTube channel you don't need a work permit. You can run a YouTube channel even on H4 visa, but you cannot monetize your videos until you have a work permit. Do not lose hope start the ground work now of making videos and earning a good Subscriber base, later when your channel is big and you have a work permit , you can earn big money. YouTube can become your full time career too. Many Successful Youtubers have turned Youtube their full time job. You can try your luck too. It requires a lot of hard work and engaging content. Visit my YouTube channel too learn more about me.

4. Take up Online Courses

Why wait for job , make job recruiters reach you by improving your skill sets. Utilize Your H4 wait time to study new technologies and improving your existing skills. When you have a work permit in future you will Stand our from the rest of the crowd as you have a better skill set. You can even enroll in a University and pursue a higher education. This will give you a better opportunity in Job Search.

5. Case studies and Projects

Learning can never stop in life. Start analyzing case studies related to your field, work on project on the technologies you are already familiar. These projects can very well stand out in your resume and fill that career gap. So Friends , Utilize your idle time and convert it into something useful for life. There is never a Tomorrow, so Start Today. ALL THE BEST 👍
item.excerpt:encoded: Interesting things you can do on a H4 visa and fill up your career gap.

item.title: Healthy Snacks for Weight Loss
item.dc:creator: letstalknila
item.content:encoded:
Are You a Person who is vigorously trying for Weight Loss , then keep reading on. We will get to know some of the healthy snacks you can munch on between your Meal times. After reading this you will no longer grab that packet of chips or box of cookies.

1. Nuts

A handful of nuts a day keep you healthy as well as satisfy that temporary hunger which arises in mid mornings. Store some nuts in ur work place or pantry and immediately go for it when you feel hungry. It will help you to avoid other unhealthy snacks.

2. Fruits

An apple a day keeps the doctor away, it might be an old saying but it's always true. Fruits are a healthy option whenever you feel hungry. The natural sugar in fruits will satisfy your temptations of eating something sugary. Next time when you think of eating a candy, pick an Orange it will definitely satisfy your taste buds.

3. Vegetable chat

Vegetables are always considered boring to eat, but what if you add some masala to it and make it even more tastier. Just mix onion, tomato, cucumber and carrot and top it with some chat masala, it will taste heavenly. So next time don't complain of eating veggies try this chat and satisfy your hunger.

4. Boiled Channa

Channa dal is a very good source of protein to our body. It is a healthy option when you want to eat something crunchy in the evenings. Soak and boil the Channa dal and your evening snack is ready instantly. Have a bowl of Channa before your workout it helps you build muscle. It's a vegan protein.

5. Bhelpuri

Bhelpuri is a traditional Indian chat food. Mix onion, tomato, rice puffs, a pinch of salt and chili powder and top it with some drops of lemon juice, your healthy and tasty chat is ready. Next time when you go to an Indian restaurant do not miss to order Bhelpuri as your snack.

6. Sprout Moong dal

Moong dal is a very good source of Protein too. It is very commonly used in Indian cooking, but when you use the sprouted version it is even more healthier. Soak moong dal for 4 hours, drain and store the moong dal in an airtight container overnight in refrigerator. Next day morning you can see the sprouted moong dal. You can eat it as such or mix with onion, tomato and chat masala and eat it spicy.

7. Popcorn

Popcorn is a mouthwatering dish for many people, guess what it is healthy too. Forget the popcorn in Movie theatre, they are all topped with creamy butter and it's not for you. Try making homemade popcorn and add a pinch of salt to it. You are all set for a family movie night at home. Salted Popcorn is a healthy snack option when you feel hungry.

8. Roasted grams

Roasted grams are one thing we all liked during childhood , but now all are kids switch to pizzas and burgers. Time to change again to our age old food items. Add roasted grams to your daily diet and you can see how easy you have chosen a healthy snack option. When you eat in right quantity it serves as a good source of protein to your body.

9. Roasted Pumpkin Seeds

Most of us ignore the seeds in the pumpkin when we cut it out. Next time save it and roast the seeds. It is a healthy snack option. It is rich in Iron and Magnesium and a good source of Fiber too. So pumpkin seed are a healthy option for weight loss.

10. Chewing gum

Chewing gum as it is not an edible snack but still it helps you to satisfy your hunger pranks. Chewing a gum when you feel bored saves you from eating any unhealthy snack. So have a pack of gum with you whenever you feel bored. Follow my YouTube Channel Lets Talk Nila to get more information on My Weight Loss Journey https://youtu.be/oHPZO7w_EcA

item.title: Work From Home Jobs for Moms
item.dc:creator: letstalknila
item.content:encoded:
Motherhood is something which every mom wants to take some time and enjoy with their little ones. Many Moms take a career break to spend time with kids and care them. Earning an extra income during the stay at home days is a dream for every mom. Many aspire to continue their career from home or earn some bucks for the bills of their family. Either way this blog will highlight some of the options for Work from Home Options for Moms.

Social Media Manager

Social media is one trending career now and many companies need skilled people to manage their social accounts. Many big companies need people to maintain their presence on Social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and YouTube. If you have very good experience in writing attractive content for social media posts and maintain their social webpages then you have a bright career in this field. You can work from home at your own flexible hours in this job. You can prepare and schedule posts when your little one naps and enjoy a productive time with your kids when they are awake.

Ads Assessor

Companies like Lionbridge and Appen are continuously hiring people for evaluating ads for them. If you are living in United States of America for more than 5 years and you have fluency in English then this is the right job for you. The hours are flexible and you can work whenever you get time in a day. You can start working even before your baby wakes up or after your baby naps. All you need is a laptop and a Reliable Internet connection. There will eb an initial Online Assessment and once you pass, your work starts immediately. This is one particular job where no phone calls are not involved and all communication is through phone. You can earn up to 14$ per hour in this job and work for 20 hours per week. This is the most comfortable job for many moms.

Freelancing

Freelancing is one opportunity which helps you to keep in touch with your skills even in a career break. You can be either a techy or a blog writer or a data entry operator. You can take up small project related to your skills and earn upon finishing the projects. Many websites offer freelancing projects online. 1. Upwork 2. Freelancer 3. MTurk 4. Guru

Social Media Influencer

You can start your own business on Social media and start earning in various ways. You can either write Blogs or Create Videos on Youtube. You can even be A Brand Ambassador and promote products on Instagram. You need to have a good crowd following you and then you can start earning a lot from Social media. If you are a People Person and have Excellent Communication skills then Social media welcomes you with Red blanket. Many moms are a successful YouTubers now and have a big crowd following them. Many moms share tips from their parenting experiences and help other moms. This could be one successful career for you if you can combine creativity with your skills. So Moms if you have an aspiration to jump start your career there are plenty of options available. Start researching and you will find opportunities opening up before you. All The Best Mommies 👍 Follow my YouTube channel for more useful content for you. https://youtu.be/95W399Vv0bc
